title: Bukhara
text: Bukhara is seen in the black and white photograph as the upholstery on the chaise longue near the windows.
description: Vert. striped print  that resembles ikat Vert.printed striped pattern resembles Ikat weave. Stylized corn stalks of tomato & lilac on dark pink.Handwoven & handprinted. Geranium
